text: Noah Lindsey Cyrus (born January 8, 2000) is Miley Cyrus's younger sister and Billy Ray Cyrus's daughter. She was born in Nashville, Tennessee. She has been in some TV shows like Hannah Montana but had very small roles. == Career == She appeared in the straight-to-DVD movie Mostly Ghostly.Noah Cyrus in Mostly Ghostly Crushable She was also in the film Ponyo with Frankie Jonas the youngest brother of the Jonas Brothers and played the character Yuria Nara. She also sang the theme song for Ponyo with Frankie too. == Personal life == She dated rapper Lil Xan. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Nashville, Tennessee Category:American child actors Category:American television actors Category:Singers from Nashville, Tennessee Category:American child singers Category:American dancers Category:American movie actors Category:American philanthropists Category:American pop singers Category:Miley Cyrus Category:Musicians from Nashville, Tennessee
title: Noah Cyrus
